p: By 2016–2095, the zonally averaged difference in the number of WHWDs and THWDs under RCP2.6 is smaller than the other two scenarios on the whole as less warming ( Supplementary Figure S5b,e,h) contributes to both less WHWDs and THWDs. The largest difference (about 60–80 days) would begin from around 2030 to 2075 under RCP 8.5, which would continue till 2095 under RCP4.5. This is in accord with Figure 3d that suggests the larger zonally averaged number of discrepant days under RCP4.5 than RCP8.5 during 2076–2095.
